Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Relates to the establishment of a state university-based center for employee ownership; repealer
Summary: Relates to the establishment of a state university-based center for employee ownership that provides education and outreach to business owners regarding employee ownership.
LawCode: Rpld & add §104-a, Ec Dev L; amd §§1836-a, 1836-b, 1836-c, 1836-d & 1836-e, Pub Auth L; amd §612, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, the public authorities law and the tax law, in relation to the establishment of a state university-based center for employee ownership; and to repeal certain provisions of the economic development law relating thereto
